title: Spatio-temporal transformer traffic prediction network based ...
summary: This paper proposes a spatiotemporal Transformer network based on multi-level causal attention (MLCAFormer) for traffic prediction. It addresses the complex characteristics of traffic flow data across both temporal and spatial dimensions.
